title: Wheres my S?
body:
Not a salty post, more amused at why Cait was granted an S and I got an A-, thought it o be strange.. [](https://gyazo.com/065f12d0b0b822f5bc87681203fd949d)
https://gyazo.com/065f12d0b0b822f5bc87681203fd949d

replies.body: i might have part of the following wrong but It's my understanding that the system compares you to how well others have played Trist, and the Cait to how well others have played Cait in the same role recently. More than just KD and farming goes towards it too, Things like wards placed/destroyed and towers/other objectives taken etc.
Because from what i can tell, that is a solo lane caitlyn, so the expected score of that would be a lot worse than an ADC tristana.

Because that's a Mid Lane Caitlin, whereas you're an ADC Tristana. 

Your score is being compared with other ADC Tristana scores. Yes, you may have gone 14/1, but I find one of the biggest contributing factors is CS. Frankly, your CS is trash compared to what an ADC Tristana should have. 

On the other hand, not many people play Mid Lane Caitlin, so there aren't many scores to compare her's with. Chances are, all the other Caitlin Mids fed their faces off and CSed poorly, so her score is S compared to those. 

I hope this makes sense :D
